messages.content: You are an AI assistant that helps people find information. You will receive a task and think step by step. Then provide your final outcome following the regular expression 'Answer: ([A-Za-z ]+,\s*)*[A-Za-z ]+'

Imagine a group with 15 scholars. Amir is connected to Reza, Moin, Pari, and Puja. Wim is connected to Wei, Kim, Puja, and Pam. Raj is connected to Nisha, Ian, Sara, and Kim. Jing is connected to Reza, Moin, Pari, and Max. Wei is connected to Kim, Puja, and Pam. Nisha is connected to Ian, Sara, and Max. Reza is connected to Moin, and Pari. Kim is connected to Pam. Ian is connected to Sara, and Max. Moin is connected to Pari. Puja is connected to Pam. Sara is connected to Max. What is the shortest path from Wim to Pari? Starting from Wim, please list the scholar names in order, including Wim, separated by commas.

First, I will identify the connections of Wim. Wim is connected to Wei, Kim, Puja, and Pam. 

Next, I will check if any of these scholars are directly connected to Pari. None of them are.

Then, I will check the connections of Wei, Kim, Puja, and Pam. Wei is connected to Kim, Puja, and Pam. Kim is connected to Pam. Puja is connected to Pam. Pam has no further connections listed.

Since none of these connections lead to Pari, I will check the next level of connections. Wei, Kim, and Puja are all connected to Pam, but Pam has no connections to Pari. 

Next, I will check the connections of the scholars connected to Wei, Kim, and Puja. Wei is connected to Kim and Puja, who are both connected to Pam, but none of these connections lead to Pari. 

Kim is only connected to Pam, who has no connections to Pari. 

Puja is connected to Pam, who has no connections to Pari. 

Since none of these paths lead to Pari, I will check the connections of the scholars connected to Amir, since Amir is connected to Pari. Amir is connected to Reza, Moin, Pari, and Puja. 

Puja is connected to Wim, so the shortest path from Wim to Pari is through Puja and Amir. 

Answer: Wim, Puja, Amir, Pari.
